definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: Investigations led to the diagnosis and treatment of subclavian artery stenosis.
sentences.chinese: 檢查明確鎖骨下動脈狹窄的診斷和治療。

sentences.english: At no time, though, did Reagan ever criticize the United Nations specifically.
sentences.chinese: 但里根從未對聯合國提出過明確的批評。

sentences.english: Andre says here's a clear principle,the most particular.
sentences.chinese: 安德烈說這裏有一個明確的原則，最個人的。

sentences.english: Now you need to explicitly run the action from the context menu.
sentences.chinese: 現在你需要在上下文菜單裏明確地執行這一指令。

sentences.english: The etiology of moyamoya disease is still unknown.
This article verifies the basic concept of counter-intelligence activities.
sentences.chinese: 本文明確了當代反情報活動的基本概念。

sentences.english: Suddenly the problem of future loomed tangibly for me.
sentences.chinese: 突然，前途的問題明確地出現在我眼前。

sentences.english: The ban on intermarriage here is quite specific.
sentences.chinese: 很明確地規定了禁止通婚聯姻。

sentences.english: For reasons that are not clear, sickle-cell disease is of very variable severity.
sentences.chinese: 理由是不明確，鐮狀細胞病是非常嚴重的變數。

sentences.english: Punish recidivists with increased sentences is explicitly promulgated in many countries' penal codes.
sentences.chinese: 加重處罰累犯，在很多國家的刑法典中都有明確規定。

sentences.english: Instruction between implementers and has a clear division.
sentences.chinese: 教學與實施者之間有着明確的分工。

sentences.english: Kant was the first definitely to signalize the distinction between Reason and Understanding.
sentences.chinese: 康德最早明確提出知性和理性的區別。

sentences.english: The legislative intent of the Basic Law was clear and there was no need for an interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 基本法的立法原意明確，故無須釋法。

sentences.english: It is now "clearly in double-digit territory, " says Mr Niedermayer.
sentences.chinese: 並將其“明確在兩位數的範圍”，內德梅耶說。

sentences.english: What meaning is warning is first question of regional forest resources early warning.
sentences.chinese: 明確警義是區域森林資源預警的起點。

sentences.english: But a definitive decision on the form of struggle to be pursued had not yet been made.
sentences.chinese: 但是對於所從事的鬥爭的明確方式還沒有作出規定。

definition: definite/certain/fixed/to fix (on sth)/to determine/to be sure/to ensure/to make certain/to ascertain/to clinch/to recognize/to confirm/OK (on computer dialog box)
to maintain (that sth is true)/to determine (a fact)/determination (of an amount)/of the firm opinion/to believe firmly/to set one's mind on/to identify with
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
